trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of floating-point numbers, typically the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Armazena um par ordenado de números de ponto flutuante, normalmente com a largura e a altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The unit for a <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> structure depends on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: A unidade para um <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> estrutura depende de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> configurações para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que é usado para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> by using the following members:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona uma sombra em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> usando os seguintes membros:

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole este código em um formulário e a chamada a `AddShadow` método ao lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
trans-unit.target: Verifique se o formulário contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> chamado `listBox1`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure from the specified existing <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> da estrutura existente <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure from which to initialize this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da qual inicializar esta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure from the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure from which to create the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> na qual a nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> será criada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure from the specified existing <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> da estrutura existente <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The width component of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: O componente de largura da nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: The height component of the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: O componente de altura da nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure from the specified dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> das dimensões especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> by using the following members:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona uma sombra em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> usando os seguintes membros:

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole este código em um formulário e a chamada a `AddShadow` método ao lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
trans-unit.target: Verifique se o formulário contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> chamado `listBox1`.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: A primeira estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: A segunda estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: Adds the width and height of one <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to the width and height of another <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a largura e altura de uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> à largura e altura de outra estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that is the result of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> que é o resultado da operação de adição.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that has a <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width" /> value of 0.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> que tem um valor <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width" /> de 0.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Tests to see whether the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure with the same dimensions as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Testa para verificar se o objeto especificado é uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> com as mesmas dimensões dessa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> and has the same width and height as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retornará <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> for um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> e tiver a mesma largura e altura desse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash desta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que especifica um valor de hash para esta estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o componente vertical desta estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: The vertical component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure, typically measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O componente vertical desta estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />, geralmente medido em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object used to draw.
trans-unit.target: A unidade para o <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> do <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> estrutura dependem de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> configurações para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto usado para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure has zero width and height.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se essa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> tem largura e altura igual a zero.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="true" /> when this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure has both a width and height of zero; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna <see langword="true" /> quando isso <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> estrutura tem de largura e altura zero; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: A primeira estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to add.
trans-unit.target: A segunda estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: Adds the width and height of one <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to the width and height of another <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a largura e altura de uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> à largura e altura de outra estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure that is the result of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que é o resultado da operação de adição.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> by using the following members:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona uma sombra em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> usando os seguintes membros:

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole este código em um formulário e a chamada a `AddShadow` método ao lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Verify that the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
trans-unit.target: Verifique se o formulário contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> chamado `listBox1`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure on the left side of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> no lado esquerdo do operador de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure on the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> no lado direito do operador de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: Testa se duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> são iguais.

trans-unit.source: This operator returns <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="sz1" /> and <paramref name="sz2" /> have equal width and height; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse operador retornará <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="sz1" /> e <paramref name="sz2" /> tiverem a mesma largura e altura; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to be converted
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> a ser convertida

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Converte a estrutura especificada <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure to which this operator converts.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> na qual esse operador é convertido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure on the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> à esquerda do operador de desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure on the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> à direita do operador de desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structures are different.
trans-unit.target: Testa se as duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> são diferentes.

trans-unit.source: This operator returns <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="sz1" /> and <paramref name="sz2" /> differ either in width or height; <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="sz1" /> and <paramref name="sz2" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: Esse operador retornará <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="sz1" /> e <paramref name="sz2" /> tiverem largura ou altura diferentes; <see langword="false" /> se <paramref name="sz1" /> e <paramref name="sz2" /> forem iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure on the left side of the subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> no lado esquerdo do operador de subtração.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure on the right side of the subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> no lado direito do operador de subtração.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the width and height of one <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure from the width and height of another <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Subtrai a largura e altura de uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> da largura e altura de outra estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that is the result of the subtraction operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> que é o resultado da operação de subtração.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure on the left side of the subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> no lado esquerdo do operador de subtração.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure on the right side of the subtraction operator.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> no lado direito do operador de subtração.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the width and height of one <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure from the width and height of another <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Subtrai a largura e altura de uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> da largura e altura de outra estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure that is a result of the subtraction operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> que é um resultado da operação de subtração.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Converte uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Converte uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> structure is converted to a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> structure by truncating the values of the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> to the next lower integer values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> estrutura é convertida em um <xref:System.Drawing.Size> estrutura truncando os valores do <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> para os próximos valores de inteiro inferiores.

trans-unit.source: Creates a human-readable string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cadeia de caracteres legível que representa essa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa essa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o componente horizontal desta estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal component of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> structure, typically measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O componente horizontal desta estrutura de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />, geralmente medido em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The unit for the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> structure depend on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: A unidade para o <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> do <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF> estrutura dependem de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> configurações para o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto que é usado para desenhar.
